body_html: I have some news to share. After upgrading the nvidia drivers from 352.39 to 367.48, I was not able to reproduce this problem anymore (neither with cuda7.5 nor cuda8.0). When I have some more time, I'll run some additional experiments but until then I consider the upgrade to 367.48 as a solution to this problem and propose to close this issue.

body: I have some news to share. After upgrading the nvidia drivers from 352.39 to 367.48, I was not able to reproduce this problem anymore (neither with cuda7.5 nor cuda8.0). When I have some more time, I'll run some additional experiments but until then I consider the upgrade to 367.48 as a solution to this problem and propose to close this issue.
